oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Country Music Hall of Fame Medallion Ceremony - Alabama, DeFord Bailey, Glen Campbell - 2006-05-06 - Tape one of two.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Country Music Hall of Fame medallion ceremony held on May 7, 2006 from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame. Tape one of two. Honorees are Alabama, DeFord Bailey and Glen Campbell.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: E.W. Bud Wendell; Vince Gill; Kyle Young; Joe Fallisco; DeFord Bailey Jr.; Charlie McCoy; Carlos Bailey; Jamie Hartford; Shawn Camp; John D. Loudermilk; Brenda Lee;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress / (00:00) E.W. Bud Wendell with opening comments and announcement of CMF board members in attendance / (03:32) Introduction of Vince Gill / (03:52) Comments from Vince Gill and performance of What Are The Doing In Heaven Today? / (12:46) Kyle Young with comments / (14:22) Announcement of Hall of Fame members in attendance (17:08) Young begins the DeFord Bailey segment / (20:21) Introduction of Joe Fallisco / (20:51) Fox Chase (Joe Fallisco) / 23:30 Introduction of DeFord Bailey Jr. / (24:01) Swing Low Sweet Chariot (DeFord Bailey Jr.) / (25:20) Young continues with the Bailey segment / (26:16) Introduction of the medallion all-star band / (27:11) Introduction of Charlie McCoy / (27:56) Pan American Blues (Charlie McCoy) / (29:35) Introduction of Carlos Bailey with comments / (30:15) The Legend Of DeFord Bailey (Carlos Bailey with DeFord Bailey Jr.) / (33:57) Young continues with the Bailey segment / (34:53) Introduction of Bailey biographer David Morton / (35:43) Young introduces members of the Bailey family / (36:39) Introduction of E.W. Bud Wendell / (36:54) Bud Wendell presents medallion to Bailey family / (39:18) Comments from the Bailey family / (42:15) Kyle Young begins the Glen Campbell segment / (45:40) Introduction of Jamie Hartford / (46:46) Comments from Jamie Hartford and performance of Gentle On My Mind (Jamie Hartford) / (51:02) Young continues with Campbell segment / (52:??) Introduction of Shawn Camp with comments and performance of By The Time I Get To Phoenix (Shawn Camp) / (55:54) Young continues with the Campbell segment / (57:??) Introduction of John D. Loudermilk with comments and performance of I Want To Live (John D. Loudermilk) / (01:01:05) Young continues with the Campbell segment / (01:05:15) Introductions of Glen Campbell's friends and family in attendance / (01:06:40) Introduction of Brenda Lee with comments about Glen Campbell and presentation of medallion / (01:11:50) Glen Campbell with acceptance remarks / (01:15:41) Rhinestone Cowboy (Glen Campbell) / (01:19:50) Kyle Young begins the Alabama segment / (01:23:55) Introduction of Lonestar / (01:24:09) TAPE END

(35:43) Young introduces members of the Bailey family / (36:39) Introduction of E.W. Bud Wendell / (36:54) Bud Wendell presents medallion to Bailey family / (39:18) Comments from the Bailey family / (42:15) Kyle Young begins the Glen Campbell segment / (45:40) Introduction of Jamie Hartford / (46:46) Comments from Jamie Hartford and performance of Gentle On My Mind (Jamie Hartford) / (51:02) Young continues with Campbell segment / (52:??)
